presentationColumns.name: # of SRs (Lifecycle)
presentationColumns.description: The total number of SRs tracked for Lifecycle changes

presentationColumns.name: Average Duration SR Unassigned to Assignee (Days)
presentationColumns.description: The total duration an SR is Unassigned to any Assignee (Days) averaged over # of SRs (Lifecycle) not assigned to an Assignee. presentationColumns.name: Average Duration of SR Lifecycle Change (Days)
presentationColumns.description: The average duration in days that an SR is with a particular status/severity/queue/resource. The metric assumes meaning seen in context of one of status, severity, queue or resource. This metric is calculated as follows: Total Duration of SR Lifecycle Change (Days)/# of SRs tracked for Lifecycle changes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - B2B Service Analytics
